member.name: P:booter.My.Resources.Resources.how_to_make_it_move_custom_gui
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to Top of code. (Before all private subs but after public class)
Dim NewPoint As New System.Drawing.Point() Dim X, Y As Integer
Titlebar Mouse Down Event
X = Control.MousePosition.X - Me.Location.X Y = Control.MousePosition.Y - Me.Location.Y http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9UiF5nkHXp4
Titlebar Mouse Move Event
If e.Button = MouseButtons.Left Then NewPoint = Control.MousePosition NewPoint.X -= (X) NewPoint.Y -= (Y) Me.Location = NewPoint End If.
